description: Register a new user account. Accepts RegisterInput with name (required, 1-255 characters), email (required, valid email format, must be unique), password (required, minimum 8 characters), and optional geolocation data. Returns AuthPayload containing accessToken (JWT, expires in 30 minutes), refreshToken (JWT, expires in 7 days), and user info (uuid, email, name). Password is hashed using bcrypt before storage. Duplicate email raises ValidationError with fieldErrors. User and profile creation are atomic with transaction rollback on failure. User history is tracked if geolocation provided (non-blocking).
graphql_operation: mutation Register($input: RegisterInput!) { auth { register(input: $input) { accessToken refreshToken user { uuid email name } } } }
